1.content:
The adventure begins with a family who live in a house in suburbia that is rather large, but not a mansion. It is white with a green door and grey roof and very neat lawns with a vegetable garden in the front yard and a mini-playground in the back.

Milton McKensie (36) is the dad and he is an electrician. He has curly, short, blond hair, brown eyes and fair skin. He wears black pants and grey shirts. He likes to play games with his kids and is interested in Greek mythology. He is 5'9 and slightly muscular, but not like Superman.

Aida McKensie (36) is the mom. She is six feet tall and of average build. She has long, straight, brown hair, fair skin and blue eyes and she generally wears red dresses. She is interested in many science-related topics, including astronomy, biology, chemistry and geology. She, like Milton, likes to play games with the kids.

Mike McKensie (10) is the oldest kid. He has short, straight, brown hair and wears white shirts and black shorts. He rides a skateboard which he sometimes lets Nadia ride. He is a bit of a rebel and not above breaking the rules, but is a good big brother and (despite getting in trouble for breaking school rules) gets good grades.

Nadia McKensie (8) is the second-oldest kid. She has her mother's hair and wears brown dresses with navy blue shirts underneath. She is very curious and imaginitive.

Albert McKensie (3) is the third-youngest kid. He has short, straight, brown hair and wears navy blue shirts and jeans. He is very advanced for his age (he can read already) and is often seen wandering around in a daydream with his toy snow leopard Simon.

Billy McKensie (1) is the older twin by two minutes. He has curly brown hair and wears neon green onesies.

Leanne McKensie (1) is Billy's twin and the youngest in the family. She has straight blonde hair and wears a little white dress with blue flowers on it and a blue bow in her hair.

Newton is the McKensies' fluffy white cat, named after Isaac Newton.

Nerissa McKensie (38) is Milton's sister and the kids' aunt and they love it when she babysits because she always makes things fun. She is 5'6, with fair skin, straight red hair that she wears down just past her shoulders, and a light blue dress with her initials embroidered on the collar. She is a tough cookie, does volunteer work and rides a white Harley. The reason why she has red hair and her brother has blond hair is because their parents (the kids' grandparents) had been trying to conceive, gave up, adopted Nerissa, but the grandmother found she was pregnant soon after.

Terry Fallon (37) is Nerissa's neighbor and good friend. She is skinny and East-Asian and wears blue shirts and grey skirts. She's very clumsy, but a huge optimist.

How does the adventure start?

(P.S. Another rule is no racism/sexism/any other prejudice unless it's a bad guy who believes that)

1122211111222212121211121112111232121.content:
The McKensies were on the beach when they met another family: it was a mother, a father, and two girls.

The father's skin was a deep brown colour and he was wearing grey swim trunks and had short black hair and a goatee. He was quite tall and thin.

The mother was of average height and weight and she had fair skin and reddish-brown hair and was wearing a neon pink one-piece swimsuit.

The oldest girl had a green one-piece swimsuit and hair and skin like her mothers and she had an average build but was quite tall.

The youngest was small for her age, with a navy blue one-piece swimsuit and skin and hair like her father's, and her hair was in pigtails.

"Hi," said Aida, "I'm Aida McKensie and this is my husband Milton. And this is my son Mike, he's ten, my daughter Nadia, she's eight, my other son Albert, he's three, and my other daughter Leanne and my other other son Billy, who are one, they're twins."

"I'm Ashley Forester," said the woman, "and this is my husband Leon, and these are my daughters Fiona, who's twelve, and Sally who's eight, the same age as your... Nadia, did you say her name was?"

"Yes, that's right," said Aida.

What happens now?

When the McKensies were at the beach, they met another family.

The father was tall, skinny, and had dark brown skin, short black hair, and a goatee and wore grey swim trunks.

The mother had an average height and build and reddish-brown, wavy hair that went down to her shoulders, and she was wearing a neon pink one-piece swimsuit.

They also had two girls, one older than the other. The eldest was tall, with an average build and skin and hair like her mother's, except her hair went down to the middle of her back. She was wearing a dark green one-piece swimsuit.

The youngest daughter was quite small, with skin and hair like her father's except her hair was in pigtails. She was wearing a navy blue one-piece swimsuit.

"Hi!," said Milton, "I'm Milton McKensie and this is my wife Aida, my son Mike, he's ten, my daughter Nadia, she's eight, my other son Albert, he's three, and my other daughter Leanne and my other other son Billy, they're twins and they're one."

14314233421.content:
Albert looked around.
He appeared to be in his own living room, but these weren't the family he knew: they all had each other's personalities!

The other version of Albert had Billy's personality, which meant he was shy but perky at the same time.

Billy had Milton's personality, which meant he laughed a lot, tried to fix things, and enjoyed listening to his parents read Greek myths.

Milton had Aida's personality, which meant that he was into science.

Aida had Leanne's personality which meant that she was easily amused but also cried easily.

Leanne had Nadia's personality, which meant that she was very curious. She also had Nadia's imagination, which led to fear of the unknown.

Nadia had Mike's personality, which meant she was a rule-breaker, rode a skateboard, and acted as a role model to Albert (much like Mike with Nadia).

And finally, Mike had Albert's personality, which meant that he was the one with a snow leopard plushie named Simon, he also had a much vivider imagination, and he was the one who was advanced. For a ten-year-old, this meant higher levels of school work.

info.brief_description: A family and their neighbors have random adventures.
info.description:
Hi there! This is my first interactive. I will introduce the characters in the first chapter. Here are the rules. If you want to do something that's against the rules, maybe this is not the story for you, but otherwise, have fun!

1.) No cussing.

2.) Don't kill anyone off, have them move away or otherwise write them out. If somebody disappears and there's a plot based on getting them back, that's fine, as long as they do come back.

3.) Transformations (shrinking, growing, age changes, shape-shifting, etc) are encouraged, provided that nobody gets fat (introducing a character who's already fat is OK as long as it's not fetishy) and that they are only temporary. An exception is superpowers, which can be permanent.

4.) No sickness (this includes adverse reactions to food) and no injuries more serious than a skinned knee. Allergies are fine (provided that nobody has an allergic reaction that produces nausea or other stomach-related symptoms), and so are people with disabilities, provided that they've always been disabled. Also, no mental illness or sleep deprivation.

5.) A bit of potty humour is fine, but don't go overboard. (e.g. a joke about someone needing to pee is fine, but a joke about someone *drinking* pee is not).

6.) Nudity is fine in a nonsexual context, but no lustful narration. A bit of romance is OK (this includes gay romance) as long as it is not smutty. Don't pair-bond characters introduced at the start (although introducing love interests is A-OK) and don't break up established couples. Also, no romance of any sort between characters who are related!

7.) No vore.

8.) Don't make dramatic character changes and have them be permanent or rewrite a character's personality.

9.) Going to other worlds is fine as long as they eventually go back home.
